issue.title: [CI] [Java] Gandiva checkstyle failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5348](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5348). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is failing Travis-CI builds now:
```Java

[WARNING] src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/evaluator/Projector.java:[145,3] (javadoc) JavadocMethod: Missing a Javadoc comment.
[WARNING] src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/evaluator/DecimalTypeUtil.java:[38,3] (javadoc) JavadocMethod: Missing a Javadoc comment.

[...]

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-checkstyle-plugin:2.17:check (validate) on project arrow-gandiva: You have 2 Checkstyle violations. -> [Help 1]
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5348?focusedCommentId=16841281) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
apologies I thought i had a green build when I merged the javadoc fixes.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5348?focusedCommentId=16841462) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4327
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4327>
